name: Virtual Baby Mother Simulator
summary: Entertain yourself with a lot of baby care fun in Baby Simulator 2022, the ultimate virtual mother and baby game for kids. Play as a babysitter and do activities like changing diapers, clothes, and playing with kids just like you would in a real baby care game. Get ready for happy home adventure family fun by doing daily household tasks like dish washing, vacuum cleaning, family shopping, cooking, laundry, and gardening in this virtual mother and baby game.
